description: City of New Orleans ownership parcels.  ESRI shapefile may be downloaded by selecting 'Export', then 'Download as: Shapefile'.  Free GIS software for viewing geometry may be downloaded from ESRI (http://www.esri.com/software/arcgis/arcreader/).  For KMZ format, please download .kmz attached.

metadata.attribution: City of New Orleans – Office of Information Technology & Innovation, Enterprise Information Team
